commit_message:
feat: implement mvgam_formula constructor with comprehensive tests

- Added mvgam_formula() constructor function for minimal formula containers
- Comprehensive parameter validation using checkmate and insight error formatting
- S3 class hierarchy preservation for formula/brmsformula/mvbrmsformula compatibility
- Print method for enhanced user experience with proper S3 dispatch
- Autocorrelation separation principle validation to prevent brms conflicts
- Complete test suite with 61 passing tests covering all functionality and edge cases
- Fixed @noRd documentation issue in stan_assembly.R
- Updated NAMESPACE for proper S3 method registration

Related to Sub-tasks 1A-1B in TRD-stancode-generation-update
